mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (membership_id, name, email, password, birth, carrier_code, phone, point, created_at, updated_at, card_num, grade_updated_at) VALUES (#{membershipId}, #{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{birth}, #{carrierCode}, #{phone}, #{point}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{cardNum}, #{gradeUpdatedAt})
INSERT INTO non_user (name, phone, birth, password, created_at, expire_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{password}, #{createdAt}, #{expireAt})
INSERT IGNORE INTO theater_favorite (user_id, theater_id, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{theaterId}, #{createdAt})
INSERT IGNORE INTO movie_favorite (user_id, movie_id, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{movieId}, #{createdAt})
